al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl - māyah. tawshīḥ mjzū’ al-raml

column2: yā lahā min ḥullatin fawq al-ghuṣūn

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl - māyah. tawshīḥ mkhl‘ al-basīṭ lābin īkhlftn al-fāzāzī

column2: yā ṣāḥ kam dhā arāk ṣāḥ
